meta.content: Columbus City Schools district website with information on departments, schools, educational resources, district policies, and more.

meta.name: viewport
meta.title: Columbus Municipal School District – Columbus, Lowndes County, Mississippi – Municipal School District

body.class: home page-template-default page page-id-351 tribe-no-js full-width-content genesis-breadcrumbs-hidden

div.a: All CMSD schools are closed through the end of the 2019-2020 school year due to COVID-19. Please check out the items under News and Announcements for information regarding instructional opportunities for students and “drive-in” wifi access for students and staff.
